1522212111.content:
Well, you knew you can't cover this up so you decide that the best thing to do is to just tell Mr. Test the truth. You slowly approached Johnny's house, you took a deep breath and knocked the door few times. After a while Mr. Test opened the door. He had angry expression on his face but other then that he looked pretty calm.

"Hello Mr. Test, I am here beca..." you started.
"I know why you're here!" He interrupted. "You're here because you broke my window! That's why!" He said, his expression getting only angrier.
You were extremely embarrassed about all of this. "Please! Mr. Test! Can I at least come in, help you clean the glass and talk it out?"
He hesitated but nodded after a while, you could tell that he was still angry at you.

You helped clean the mess but you weren't talking with Mr. Test, other than his few remarks about his sore feet and the amount of money it'll take to replace the window the room was quiet. When you were completely done with the cleaning you went to the kitchen to discuss the situation.

"So I know this looks bad Mr. Test but please could you not tell my parents and don't call the police?" You said looking at the floor.
He sighed, "I'm sorry but you know that's not an option, windows aren't that cheap, you should've been more careful..."
"Please Mr. Test, I'll do anything! Please!" you were practically begging him.
"You know there's nothing you can do, you can't offer me anything..." he said.

You realized that you were really desperate, you were ready to really do anything to keep this secret. You remembered Mr. Tests remarks about his feet, maybe you can use that to your advantage. Question is: how far are you willing to humiliate yourself?
